resources.string: 您的帐户没有被标记或限制。一切安好！
您的帐号因在对局内使用外部辅助而被标记。
您的帐户被禁止加入竞技场。
您的帐户禁止参加包含真实奖品的锦标赛。
您的账户因刷分而被标记。

string.name: accountMuted
string.comment: muted in the sense of: You cannot chat with your opponent anymore or post messages.

resources.string: 您的帐户已被排除在排行榜之外。
您的博客已被版主隐藏。

string.name: playTimeout
string.comment: play timeout = Lichess prevents you temporarily from playing any games

string.name: communicationGuidelines
string.comment:
Part of a longer sentence:
Read our communication guidelines. Failure to follow the communication guidelines can result in accounts being muted.
